website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Gel Quantum 180 TR is a lightweight and comfortable cross-training shoe that was generally favored by most users and fitness enthusiasts. A huge number of purchasers were happy about its versatility as well as ample support and cushioning. Despite all the acclaim that the model received, there were also a few disgruntled reviewers who lamented its uncomfortably tight fit and poorly-constructed upper.
pros: Numerous gym buffs praised the Asics Gel Quantum 180 TR for providing sturdy support, especially during lateral movements
A majority of the buyers complimented the shoe for being lightweight and comfortable
Most fitness fanatics remarked that it was efficient during weightlifting sessions, various CrossFit workouts, and cardio classes
Its durability was another factor that several users liked about the footwear
Some people were satisfied with the cushioning that it provided during high-impact exercises
A few reviewers found that it was true to size
cons: Many consumers reported that its fit was too narrow
Two wearers complained about the upper falling apart after a few months of gym use

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of ASICS shoes. My first were some running shoes that were very light weight and breathable. I loved them, but they were getting worn out. The only problem with the old shoes was how soft the soles had become. I could feel rocks and other debris, and it was painful. These new shoes are just a breathable, and they feel just as light (technically they are a little heavier). These shoes have a more ridged sole with more rubber tread, and they provide superior lateral support. They have all the pros (and more) of my old shoes, and none of the cons. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Fit way too small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look sleek and may have been wonderful but they were so small that after a minute of walking in them I was afraid I was going to injure my foot. The joint/knuckle of my big toe was just the right length in the shoe that when I went to push off my big toe to walk the shoe would "bite back" on my toe joint making it feel like it was going to pop out of the socket. I own 2 pairs of asics in 10.5, which this was, and those two pair fit perfectly. This definitely runs small. I cant say by how much because I returned these and will not be trying again.
customer_reviews.author: Seth C

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: love this shoe. Admittedly I traded the Asics insole for a Dr Scholl's Ultracool insole  but the combo is like walking on springs. Personal opinion, but will purchase another pair or two before Asics discontinues them. That always drives me crazy... you find a shoe you love and the manufacturer decides to stop making it - soo frustrating! Anyway, really enjoy wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Bryan

customer_reviews.title: ...I've been wearing Asics for 40 years
customer_reviews.text: I got my first pair of Asics back in the day when they were called Tiger. They have always been a great fit. Excellent construction. Excellent shoe for exercise. I love these shoes. They are great for workouts and everyday use. The Gel - front and back - makes a huge difference. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: My2Cents

customer_reviews.title: Great cross-trainers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to replace my discontinued Asics cross-trainers. I was not disappointed. They look great, the materials are of high quality, and they were comfortable and performed well the first wearing out of the box. I would highly recommend them, particularly if a buyer likes the feel of the Asics brand for this sort of shoe. The training I do requires a great deal of lateral movement, so that support is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Heath M Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, comfy, supportive
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Asics cross-training shoes. I've been wearing their Kayano running shoes for years and love them. These cross-trainers are excellent for daily wear at work where I walk around a lot. I haven't worked out or done cardio in them, but they fit great and feel very comfy and supportive. Durability will take some time to measure, though they feel solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: Tan Gent

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have used ASICS running shoes for a long time because of their support and durability. These trainers have lived up to the quality tradition. I just don't understand why ASICS stopped making them. The shoes offer great support when jumping, and when changing directions during drills. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: True to size.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is really durable. I use it for trail running and so far after over 400 miles, there is hardly any wear on the sole and absolutely no rips or loose stitching or failed glue. Everything is still perfectly intact.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: but knew that upon ordering so a perfect fit. The shoe is very comfortable and sleek ...
customer_reviews.text: Size larger than my dress shoe, but knew that upon ordering so a perfect fit. The shoe is very comfortable and sleek looking. I would recommend this shoe for the buyer who is a serious trainer due to weight and not a ton of support. For casual day to day wear, just a very comfortable shoe. If one has a wide foot or needs a lot of structural shoe support for workouts, would recommend a shoe with more structure to it. If you are the running king or queen, and value lightweight comfort with minimal upper foot support, a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: They are much Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I've worn "D" width shoes for 40 years. I've purchased Asics shoes in "D" in the past and they fit fine. These shoes were not "D" width shoes. At best they were "C". I had to send them back straight away and couldn't buy them in a wider size. Boo!
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: PAINFULLY Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I have several other pair of Asics shoes, and they fit extremely well, but these shoes were WAY too narrow. They seemed like a 'B' width, but there was no designation on the shoes or the box. Returned to Asics and they're charging me for returning them. Rethinking Asics... got NB Training shoes instead.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes that reduce knee impact
customer_reviews.text: I have done only about 30 miles in a pair so far. Great impact absorption and I can feel my knee is less stressed after running. If you are new to running, don't expect shoes to make you a better runner, but it does make the sport less risky for most.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable! I put some cheap $17 insoles from Walmart in these shoes and my feet feel great all day, and I run around on concrete floors all day at Costco. They were a little narrower than I would have liked, but still comfortable. Also, these shoes breathe well and will dry off fast between use.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Francis

customer_reviews.title: Caution! Wet floor
customer_reviews.text: These are 5 star shoes BUT on wet surfaces, these shoes are a death trap! Extremely unsafe on all surfaces without a good bit of texture. Other than that, they fit great, wear great and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Halliea

customer_reviews.title: good fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: Solid design, good fit and feel. I purchased these shoes for multi-purpose use (running, gym, outdoor sports). The design at the forefoot, where I normally see the most wear and tear (literally) is sturdy enough to stand up to this kind of use, and has held up well. Happy with this purchase from both a form and function point of view.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hook

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: I use the shoes as gym shoes in my thrice weekly workout. The only thing I dislike is the color. I prefer black.
customer_reviews.author: KButler

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfy shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered mine a half inch bigger than my actual size due to being too tight. The shoes looks and feels great! no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: I bought these based on my prior purchase of ASICS ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on my prior purchase of ASICS Men's Gel-Quantum 180 2 running Shoe, which are the comfiest pair of shoes I've ever owned. These shoes are similarly comfy, but have a firmer and springier feel than the 180 2 running Shoe.
customer_reviews.author: A shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit, comfort , stability and quality !
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. They provide excellent support and stability . I have had 2 knee operations and I experience no pain . I will keep buying them as long as they make them .
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Most ASICS are extremely comfortable right away
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were a bit stiff when I first got them. Most ASICS are extremely comfortable right away. These only took a few times wearing them and broke in just fine. Great work out shoes or every day wear around shoes.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good to Go
customer_reviews.text: Comfy walking shoes. Nice look. A bit tight with thin ankle socks, but okay.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Hole in mesh lining in less then 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable for both exercise and walking, but don't seem very durable. I have had these shoes for about 5 months and there is already whole in the mesh upper lining and the soles of the shoes already have noticeable wear. Wear and tear after regular use is unavoidable, but I would expect more durability from a 100 plus dollar pair of shoes that I have had for less then 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A Elias

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of ASICS and won't be my last. I love these shoes. Comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but too narrow for me.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, but too narrow for me. Bought another pair of Asics, which fit much better. Asics are great shoes. I really like the ones I ended up with, but disappointed that these did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: V & D in Tampa

customer_reviews.title: I liked the look and features
customer_reviews.text: Ran small for me and they did not have the next size up. I liked the look and features.
customer_reviews.author: APorter

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn but ok for the price
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Yet to be disappointed with the many pairs of Asics I've owned over ...
customer_reviews.text: Yet to be disappointed with the many pairs of Asics I've owned over the years. As trainers these shoes are by far the most comfortable. The gel technology assists with better form on a variety of moves/exercises. Would certainly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great workout shoes
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to put on my Asics and workout. They fit great, super light. and the gel sole, super reactive. I had a pair of Asics for 5 years and went away from you all. Great shoe, I'm back.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt E

customer_reviews.title: Good training shoes for gyms
customer_reviews.text: Good training shoes for gym with modest cushion for cross training and weight lifting, but the toe box is a little bit loose
customer_reviews.author: KirinL

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Second pair in the past year for sprint training. Love's.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne F. Plympton

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe. Excellent service. Excellent provider. Outdoor Equipped is an excellent provider/source.
customer_reviews.author: V. J. Vineyard

customer_reviews.title: These are very comfortable, they were just a little tighter than my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, they were just a little tighter than my other ASICS were to start. Once I wore them a few times they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good for cross training and good support, slightly heavy but I guess that comes with the extra support and I will get used to it
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy ASICS and these shoes do not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy ASICS and these shoes do not disappoint! I between a 10.5 and 11 and the 11 fit great.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Average  Cross Training Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Arch support could be a little better. After wearing these for a while they feel stiff with little cushion
customer_reviews.author: Army Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Fits small
customer_reviews.text: A tight fit, returned to get a half size larger. Wish they offered a wide size option.
customer_reviews.author: AZ-Rob90

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair I have purchased and this model fits better on thin feet than most other Asics. Very durable and will last longer than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. Well worth the cost. Comfiest shoes he’s ever worn. We have bought 2 pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size (length) is acceptable, however, a wider fit is desirable.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert C. Barden

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Very comfortable. Use it for cross training. ASICS are the best
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These feel amazing. I admit I upgraded from a pair walmart ...
customer_reviews.text: These feel amazing. I admit I upgraded from a pair walmart specials but man do they feel nice on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Harlan M.

customer_reviews.title: Good insulation in the sole
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is narrow and tight. Good insulation in the sole. It's just o.k. for running.It was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great jogging shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for jogging and at home. I have 3 pair. For maximum spring in the step I firmly tighten the shoes strings in the middle only.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: These are really good shoes. I bought them because I do insanity ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really good shoes. I bought them because I do insanity and was looking for something soft for the exercises that I do these were a little rougher than what I wanted but still good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice CT shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice CT shoe. Would have given it 5 stars except these seen a little narrow to me.
customer_reviews.author: bvupstate

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price I didn't think it held up compared to other shoe brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comy
customer_reviews.text: My husband has diabetes. So finding shoes that are comfy is hard. But he says that these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: absolutely amazing. I have arches and had Adidas that gave ...
customer_reviews.text: absolutely amazing. I have arches and had Adidas that gave me shin splints. this completely fixed the problem. best running shoe ive ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Simonsgaard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit nice and comfortable after a couple of times worn. Look great...
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Training Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great trading shoes. I plan to order a second pair this week.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe for Everything.
customer_reviews.text: Light, Fits Great, fantastic for working out and running. Perfect all-around shoe
customer_reviews.author: Brett James Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Great for training!
customer_reviews.text: I've used only Asics running shoes for the past 20 years. These training shoes do not disappoint! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Logan S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.  Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes most13's are too small for me this one fits perfect. Ahhhh. At last a real 13
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and supported shoe. I only use it when I train.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has a lot of support and cushion in the right places. This is my third pair.
customer_reviews.author: MN Gal

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fit, cushioning more than adequate, and really looks great!
customer_reviews.author: butch uyguanco

customer_reviews.title: Good designed, good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Handsome, stable shoes. Fit is quite nicely for me, my width is between medium and wide, length is medium. Comfort, supportive cushion, the gel does the job. I'm an Asics fan now.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tran

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product; sneakers run extremely small causing blisters and pain. The quality of the sneaker is very low. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove, nice and light weight and comfortable for my 1st workout. I love Asics. Great grand and amazing shoe style. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jimmyjazz01

customer_reviews.title: Little narrow for my foot.
customer_reviews.text: The length is fine, but it feels little narrow. If I saw them at a store, I probably would have kept looking. However Amazon's price is great and New Balance makes a quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: CoachSwayzee

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Quantum 180 TR Running Shoes, Monument/Black/Sulpher Spring, 8 D(M) US
product_meta.description: The GEL-Quantum 180 TR shoe features 180 degrees of our signature GEL Cushioning System to soften the impact of abrupt movements experienced in running and cross-training workouts. The full-length Trusstic System combines spring-loaded ride with extra stability for quicker take-offs, and a rock-steady base to keep feet set while performing explosive lifts. Weight: 12.0. Heel Height: 22mm. Forefoot Height: 12mm.
feature_bullets: AHAR Plus Outsole - Strategically positioned in critical areas of the outsole, this exceptionally durable compound is 50% more durable than standard ASICS High Abrasion Rubber.
Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Technology Cushioning System - Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.
Trusstic System technology - Reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoe.
Solyte Midsole Material - A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS standard EVA and SpEVA midsoles. Also features enhanced cushioning and durability.
Synthetic Leather and Mesh Upper - Lightweight, comfortable and breathable, enhancing performance and fit.
